column1: Table 7: State and Federal prisoners held in private facilities or local jails, by jurisdiction, yearend 2002 and 2003.
Authors:  Paige M. Harrison and Allen J. Beck
Table 7. State and Federal prisoners held in private facilities or local jails, by jurisdiction, yearend 2002 and 2003.
-- Not applicable. Prison and jails form an integrated system.
a/Based on the total number of inmates under State or Federal jurisdiction.
b/Includes Federal inmates held in non-secure privately operated facilities (6,471 in 2003 and 6,598 in 2002).
c/Inmates held in other State facilities include interstate compact cases.
